meanings.definition: An urban landscape or view of a city.
meanings.sent1: The cityscape was filled with tall buildings and busy streets.
meanings.sent2: I love admiring the cityscape from the top of a skyscraper.
meanings.sent3: The cityscape looked like a giant puzzle of buildings and roads.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the cityscape transformed into a glowing tapestry of lights.
meanings.sent5: The cityscape at night was a breathtaking sight of twinkling skyscrapers.

meanings.definition: The physical appearance of a city, including its buildings, streets, and other features.
meanings.sent1: The cityscape changed dramatically as new buildings were constructed.
meanings.sent2: The cityscape of New York is iconic with its towering skyscrapers.
meanings.sent3: The cityscape seemed to be a never-ending maze of concrete and steel.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cityscape of memories, each building representing a different moment.
meanings.sent5: The cityscape of Tokyo was a blend of traditional temples and modern architecture.
